Text: Screenshots look pretty lousy, at least compared to the 2.93GB version. Just Saying.

If it's true that this other file with 2.9GB has the same quality as this one - then could someone explain to me how such a thing is possible?  Can you really come up with the same quality when compressing the file by two thirds?
You acteally need a full HD tv/monitor to view the true quality of this film. Please learn the definition of "pixels".
